segments.text: Excuse me , can you tell me where I can take a taxi ? This is the first time I have been in England , so I don't know where I can do at all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course.Don ' t worry . I'll call one for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much , by the way , is it quite expensive to take a taxi ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , besides it versa according to the distance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . I only hope to get a skillful driver , and drive me to my stop safe way .
segments.speaker: S1
